COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 1:
Title: Nike Competitor Analysis - The Strategy Story
Content: Conducting a competitor analysis for Nike involves examining the major sportswear and athletic gear market companies that offer similar products or services. Here’s how you might analyze Nike ’s key competitors
Source: https://thestrategystory.com/blog/nike-competitor-analysis/

COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 2:
Title: Top 19 Nike Alternatives & Competitors in 2025
Content: Home » Competitors » Top 19 Nike Competitors & Alternatives in 2024. Market share : 1.76%. Parent: Nike , Inc. (2003–present). Converse shoes are known more for their unique style and looks rather than their sporting abilities.
Source: https://www.marketing91.com/top-10-nike-competitors/

COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 3:
Title: Top 20 Nike Competitors & Alternatives | Business Strategy Hub
Content: Nike vs . Adidas rivalry cuts across different sectors from footwear, apparel, and sports equipment, and accessories.Its ever-increasing revenue and market share in China makes it one of top Nike ’s competitors . 20. K-Swiss.
Source: https://bstrategyhub.com/top-nike-competitors-alternatives/

COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 4:
Title: Top 10 Nike Competitors & Alternatives (2025)
Content: While both Adidas and Nike share a passion for sports and performance-driven products, their business strategies and brand identities differ significantly. Adidas focuses on crafting products that combine performance with style.
Source: https://businessmodelanalyst.com/nike-competitors-alternatives/
